content:
@Rishi Gupta Design for custom fields settings,
CustomProfileFields.png

Move "Deactivate account" section to last and settings includes long text field, "Address". Let me know suggestions.
@Yashashvi Dave I think "deactivate account" should probably be left-justified in this model. But the actual "User profile" section looks reasonable.

awesome! Tim, what do you think of vertically justifying everything, like

Address
[input       ]
[            ]
[            ]

Github username
[            ]

which would allow for longer labels and input boxes?
Yashashvi, I could also imagine moving "Deactivate account" to below the API key section
@Rishi Gupta yeah, I think that'd be an improvement.

@Yashashvi Dave @Tim Abbott
Current view of Custom profile fields are like this :
https://chat.zulip.org/user_uploads/2/1f/pkF9r6ea3i-xGBGAUvGmx1JW/customProfileFields.png
The better view would be to Deactivate account button :
https://www.screencast.com/t/EteEcvvx
Please provide feedback.
And this feature can be applied to all buttons of custom profile header. (if proposed)
Can you provide screenshot or something? screencast is not working for me.

@Yashashvi Dave @Rishi Gupta The important instances are :
first_instance.png
second_instance.png
Rishi have better idea of how it should look for deactivate account button. But we probably don't want that for custom profile fields headers, they should look similar to User settings fields header.
@Rohit Kumar Singh working on improving the buttons is a basically unrelated project; feel free to work on it, but I'd prefer not to clutter the discussion of this feature with discussion of that.
